text: "Black Water" is a 1974 song by The Doobie Brothers. It was taken from their fourth studio album What Were Once Vices Are Now Habits and was originally the B-side to the hit single Another Park, Another Sunday. It was re-released in March 1975 and went to number 1 in the United States, number 11 in Canada, number 22 in Australia and number 18 in New Zealand. It was covered by Garth Brooks and was remade with Zac Brown Band for their 14th studio album Southbound in 2014. ==References== Category:1974 songs Category:Country rock songs Category:Southern rock songs Category:Roots rock songs Category:The Doobie Brothers songs Category:Garth Brooks songs Category:Zac Brown Band songs
title: Black Water (song)
